# Adley Enterprises LLC

> Fiberglass boat repair specialists and adjustable transducer mount manufacturer in Melrose, Minnesota. Serving Central MN including St. Cloud, Sauk Rapids, Sauk Centre, Cold Spring, and surrounding communities.

Adley Enterprises provides fiberglass-only boat repair services and manufactures American-made adjustable transducer mounting boards in-house. The business has 15+ years of experience and operates from 16 Industry Parkway NW, Melrose, MN 56352.

- Phone: (320) 726-0822
- Email: sales@adleyenterprises.com
- Hours: Monday-Thursday 6:30 AM - 4:00 PM, Friday by appointment

## Services

- [Fiberglass Boat Repair](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/services/fiberglass-boat-repair): Structural and cosmetic fiberglass repair for cracked, chipped, gouged, or stressed boat surfaces
- [Hull Collision Repair](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/services/hull-collision-repair): Impact and collision hull repair with fiberglass reconstruction, fairing, and finish blending
- [Gel Coat and Exterior Painting](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/services/gel-coat-exterior-painting): Gel coat touch-up and exterior refinishing for protection and appearance
- [Dent and Scratch Repair](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/services/dent-scratch-repair): Dent, chip, and scratch correction with finish-ready blending
- [Buffing and Waxing](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/services/buffing-waxing): Protective finishing services for fiberglass surfaces

## Products

- [Adjustable Transducer Mounts](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/products): American-made adjustable transducer mounting boards manufactured in-house
- [Single Adjustable Transducer Board](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/products/single-adjustable-transducer-board): Single transducer mount, $91.00, free shipping
- [Dual Transducer Board - Port Side](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/products/dual-transducer-board-port-side): Dual mount port side, $175.50, free shipping
- [Dual Transducer Board - Starboard Side](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/products/dual-transducer-board-starboard-side): Dual mount starboard side, $175.50, free shipping

- [St. Cloud, MN](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/service-areas/st-cloud-mn): Serving St. Cloud area boat owners

- [Sauk Centre, MN](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/service-areas/sauk-centre-mn): Serving Sauk Centre area
- [Cold Spring, MN](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/service-areas/cold-spring-mn): Serving Cold Spring area
- [Paynesville, MN](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/service-areas/paynesville-mn): Serving Paynesville area
- [Albany, MN](https://www.adleyenterprisesllc.com/service-areas/albany-mn): Serving Albany area
